summary: Iasonas arrives in Athens starting his new ambitious career as "architects' guide". His group consists of international students of Architecture, finishing their ERASMUS in Thessaloniki. ... See full summary »
cast: Michalis Ikonomou|Katerina Mavrogiorgi|Kathrin Suckfiel|François Renault|Anne-Marie O'Sullivan|Stavroula Kontopoulou|Nikolas Piperas|Maria Perez|Michael-John Raftopoulos
title: O xenagos
